name: Bobby
firstLine: Your products are all amazing - love the LA vibes!

name: Jaymie
firstLine: Love your brand's commitment to sustainability - keeping more than 500,000 pounds of plastic from ever being produced - that's amazing!

name: Jacob
firstLine: Congrats on being the world's first knotless hammock suspension system. Loved that you're bringing hammocks to the international market!

name: Anne
firstLine: Love your brand's commitment to sustainability and saving the sloths by using eco-friendly materials and donate annually to organizations. You guys are amazing!

name: Suzana
firstLine: Great job with ETC - creating a community of free spirits, curious souls, and adventurous nomads is a brilliant idea.

name: Seth
firstLine: Super impressive your brand has been featured in top press such as Forbes, Entrepreneur and Fast Company

name: Amy
firstLine: Love your brand's commitment to sustainability and ethical manufacturing. You guys are amazing!

name: Matthew
firstLine: Great job with BKV - creating a community of Conscious Adventurers is a brilliant idea.

name: Jen
firstLine: Nearly $500,000 is given to the USFS for Wildfire Prevention Education - It's really amazing!

name: Lanai
firstLine: Love your support for survivors of sexual violence by donating 10% of your profits. You guys are awesome!

name: Brad
firstLine: Love the story of how you started YoColorado as a small basement operation. Very inspirational!

name: Gordon
firstLine: Love your brand's commitment to sustainability by using sustainable materials. You guys are amazing!

name: Loz
firstLine: Create a community that cares for our planet is an amazing idea!

name: Benjamin
firstLine: Love the story of how you guys started Belong Designs with $800

name: Dominic
firstLine: Love the quote 'We believe that looking awesome and feeling awesome is a right, not a luxury' - Women should be looking awesome all the time!

name: Laurel
firstLine: Love the mission '...share, celebrate your story and help you hold onto lifeâ€™s moments...' - Have physical photo books is a totally different feeling.

name: Greg
firstLine: Create a brand with a dream to motivate people - you guys are awesome!

name: Greg
firstLine: Love your support for growth and positive development of the next generation leaders by donating 1% of your top line revenue.

name: Jake
firstLine: Love your brand's commitment to sustainability by using durable materials and recyclable packaging. You guys are amazing!

name: Jordan
firstLine: Love that you provide clean water to one person in need for every item purchased - amazing!

name: Bridget
firstLine: Knowing that you guys were leading divisions at Zappos is very impressive - I've read the Zappos book and I love the company culture.

name: Sadie
firstLine: Great job with Tradlands - turned $10,000 into an $800,000 clothing business is pretty impressive!

name: Bart
firstLine: Love that you started Be Hippy with your true passion!

name: Kylee
firstLine: Love the 'A World of Sisters' movement - the concept of women love each other as sisters is very awesome!

name: Jared
firstLine: Love that 'Everything in the shop is handpicked' - Quality over quantity!
